item.title: The Browser as an application platform
item.description: <img src="/media/Chromium_Logo.png" alt="chromium logo" /> With Google launching their chrome book is significant as it reflects a substantial shift in the world of computing. For the first time ever, the application platform isn’t the operating system, nor is it adobe air, .net or java, it’s the browser. The browser once, a simple tool for fetching and rendering content is now the most important application platform in the world.
